name: domain_check
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bulk_domain_check.
Tool description: Bulk Domain Availability Check. All tlds supported. 
API description: Checks the availability status of one or multiple domains using the RapidAPI service.

domains.description: Comma-separated list of domains to check.

domain.description: A specific domain name to check in addition to the list. Defaults to None.
